Once per day, when you roll Stealth for initiative at the start of a combat, you can choose to be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Invisible] for 1 minute. If you spend a Mythic Point while beginning the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Avoid Notice] exploration activity, you are invisible for as long as you continue to Avoid Notice.
